00047 void DataSetTest_GenericData::ColsFromDataSetWithZeroRows()
00048 {
00049         GenericData gd;
00050         GenericFileReader reader;
00051         reader.SetFilename("../data/small_cel_file_with_dataset_of_zero_rows");
00052         reader.ReadHeader(gd);
00053 
00054         // Open a DataSet that has 0 rows.
00055         DataSet* ds = gd.DataSet(0,3);
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ds);
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ds->Cols() == 2);
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ds->Rows() == 0);
00059 
00060         ds->Delete();
00061 
00062         // Open another DataSet that has 0 rows.
00063         ds = gd.DataSet(0,4);
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ds);
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ds->Cols() == 2);
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ds->Rows() == 0);
00067 
00068         ds->Delete();
00069 }
